Bafamoon.\""},{"lineNumber":237046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「JAPANの天才陰陽師と全裸男の戦いやね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a battle between Japan's genius onmyoji and a naked start,"},{"lineNumber":237050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バファムーン選手の行動を封じます」","translatedEnglishLine":"trying to restrict Bafamoon’s sight...\""},{"lineNumber":237059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「接近を許してしまえば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If he is allowed to get close,"},{"lineNumber":237060,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それだけで早雲選手の敗北は確実です」","translatedEnglishLine":"Soun’s defeat would be certain.\""},{"lineNumber":237061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これにより試合は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because of this, the match became a battle of whether"},{"lineNumber":237062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バファムーン選手が攻撃圏内に入るのが先か、","translatedEnglishLine":"Bafamoon enters the attack range first,"},{"lineNumber":237063,"originalJapaneseLine":"　早雲選手が仕留めきるのが先かという戦いに」","translatedEnglishLine":"or Soun can finish him off before that.\""},{"lineNumber":237064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「式神を飛ばし続ける早雲選手と、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Player Soun kept releasing shikigami,"},{"lineNumber":237065,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一歩ずつ歩き続けるバファムーン選手！」","translatedEnglishLine":"while player Bafamoon continued to walk forward step by step!\""},{"lineNumber":237066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ジリジリとした試合に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In this tense match,"},{"lineNumber":237067,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みーんな言葉を失って夢中で見とったわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"everyone was speechless and totally absorbed.\""},{"lineNumber":237068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして！　長い時間をかけて！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And then! After a long time!"},{"lineNumber":237069,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二人は至近距離まで近づき、","translatedEnglishLine":"the two got close to point-blank range,"},{"lineNumber":237070,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バファムーン選手が腕を振りかぶります！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and player Bafamoon raised his arm to strike!\""},{"lineNumber":237071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「決まるか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Will it hit!"},{"lineNumber":237072,"originalJapaneseLine":"　と、皆が固唾を呑んだその瞬間！」","translatedEnglishLine":"At that breath-held moment for everyone!\""},{"lineNumber":237073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、惜しい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, so close!"},{"lineNumber":237074,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここで限界に達したバファムーン選手！","translatedEnglishLine":"At this point, player Bafamoon reached his limit!"},{"lineNumber":237075,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バッタリと倒れてしまいました！」","translatedEnglishLine":"He collapsed suddenly!\""},{"lineNumber":237076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ホンマ、あともう一歩やったんやけどなー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really, it was just one step away."},{"lineNumber":237077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、手に汗握ったで」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it had us all gripping sweat in our hands.\""},{"lineNumber":237078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「試合後インタビューによると、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"According to the post-match interview,"},{"lineNumber":237079,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元々の目的は優勝ではなく全裸教の布教。","translatedEnglishLine":"the original goal wasn’t victory but spreading the Naked Sect religion."},{"lineNumber":237080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに関しては成功を収めたと言っていい」","translatedEnglishLine":"In that regard, he can be said to have succeeded.\""},{"lineNumber":237081,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、なんとも満足げでした」","translatedEnglishLine":"He seemed quite satisfied.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「赤い光がぴかぴか眩しかったですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The red light was dazzling and flashing, wasn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「長時間に及ぶ激闘はなんと十分も続き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The fierce battle lasted surprisingly for a full ten minutes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんと、なんとなんと最後は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and, and, and in the end..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ザンスさんがギブアップを宣言して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mr. Zans declared his surrender,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決着となりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and that settled the match."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これもまた意外やった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That was also surprising."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合後のインタビューによりますと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "According to the post-match interview,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っている最中にアレキサンダーを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he said that during the fight, he really wanted to make Alexander his subordinate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしても部下にしたくなった、と」
「その為には圧勝なんて言葉でも足りない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For that reason, a mere overwhelming victory wouldn't be enough,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真の圧勝をしなければならない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had to achieve a true crushing victory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このままやっても勝っただろうが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He might have won even if he continued as is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それじゃあ辛勝になって意味がない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but that would have been a narrow win and meaningless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから試合を預けたかったのだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So he wanted to entrust the match..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、仰っていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's what he said."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かるような分からんような……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I kind of understand it, but also kind of don't...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、変なこだわりの多い子やからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, he's a kid with a lot of strange fixations, after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみにこの後、ザンス選手は――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, after this, player Zans—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当は勝てないと思ったんじゃないですか〜？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did you really think you couldn't win, huh~?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、失礼なこと聞いた記者を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He punched and swung around the reporter who rudely asked that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殴って振り回してブン投げてました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then threw him far away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにしとんねん、あの子は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What on earth is that kid doing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Dブロック代表者決定戦、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D Block Representative Decider Match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条早雲ＶＳ裸族王バファムーン」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hojo Soun VS The Naked Tribe King Bafamoon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPANの天才陰陽師と全裸男の戦いやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a battle between Japan's genius onmyoji and a naked man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ってなんや、言葉にするとすごいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Well, when you put it into words it sounds amazing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時間をかけるのは得策ではないと判断したか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Perhaps deciding it’s unwise to take too much time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲選手が試合開始から大量の式神を飛ばし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Soun unleashed a large number of shikigami from the start,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バファムーン選手の行動を封じます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: trying to restrict Bafamoon’s actions."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、それで倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, that wasn’t enough to knock down

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バファムーン選手はんではなかったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Bafamoon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなのです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陰陽術の猛攻を受けながら尚、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even while taking a fierce onslaught of onmyoji magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲選手への歩みを止めませんでした！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he did not stop moving toward player Soun!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一歩一歩、のっしのっしと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Step by step, lumbering along,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全裸の男が早雲はんに迫っていく姿は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the naked man steadily approached Soun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんともホラー的な絵面やったで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which was quite a horror-like sight..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「接近を許してしまえば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If he is allowed to get close,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけで早雲選手の敗北は確実です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soun’s defeat would be certain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これにより試合は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of this, the match became a battle of whether

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バファムーン選手が攻撃圏内に入るのが先か、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bafamoon enters the attack range first,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲選手が仕留めきるのが先かという戦いに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or Soun can finish him off before that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「式神を飛ばし続ける早雲選手と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Player Soun kept releasing shikigami,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一歩ずつ歩き続けるバファムーン選手！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while player Bafamoon continued to walk forward step by step!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ジリジリとした試合に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In this tense match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みーんな言葉を失って夢中で見とったわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: everyone was speechless and totally absorbed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして！　長い時間をかけて！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And then! After a long time!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は至近距離まで近づき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the two got close to point-blank range,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バファムーン選手が腕を振りかぶります！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and player Bafamoon raised his arm to strike!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「決まるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Will it hit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、皆が固唾を呑んだその瞬間！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that breath-held moment for everyone!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、惜しい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, so close!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで限界に達したバファムーン選手！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, player Bafamoon reached his limit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バッタリと倒れてしまいました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He collapsed suddenly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ホンマ、あともう一歩やったんやけどなー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really, it was just one step away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、手に汗握ったで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it had us all gripping sweat in our hands."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合後インタビューによると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "According to the post-match interview,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々の目的は優勝ではなく全裸教の布教。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the original goal wasn’t victory but spreading the Naked Sect religion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに関しては成功を収めたと言っていい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In that regard, he can be said to have succeeded."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、なんとも満足げでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seemed quite satisfied."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

After a long time!"},{"lineNumber":237069,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二人は至近距離まで近づき、","translatedEnglishLine":"the two got close to point-blank range,"},{"lineNumber":237070,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バファムーン選手が腕を振りかぶります！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and player Bafamoon raised his arm to strike!\""},{"lineNumber":237071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「決まるか！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Will it hit!"},{"lineNumber":237072,"originalJapaneseLine":"　と、皆が固唾を呑んだその瞬間！」","translatedEnglishLine":"At that breath-held moment for everyone!\""},{"lineNumber":237073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、惜しい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, so close!"},{"lineNumber":237074,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここで限界に達したバファムーン選手！","translatedEnglishLine":"At this point, player Bafamoon reached his limit!"},{"lineNumber":237075,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バッタリと倒れてしまいました！」","translatedEnglishLine":"He collapsed suddenly!\""},{"lineNumber":237076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ホンマ、あともう一歩やったんやけどなー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really, it was just one step away."},{"lineNumber":237077,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、手に汗握ったで」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it had us all gripping sweat in our hands.\""},{"lineNumber":237078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「試合後インタビューによると、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"According to the post-match interview,"},{"lineNumber":237079,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元々の目的は優勝ではなく全裸教の布教。","translatedEnglishLine":"the original goal wasn’t victory but spreading the Naked Sect religion."},{"lineNumber":237080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに関しては成功を収めたと言っていい」","translatedEnglishLine":"In that regard, he can be said to have succeeded.\""},{"lineNumber":237081,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、なんとも満足げでした」","translatedEnglishLine":"He seemed quite satisfied.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「赤い光がぴかぴか眩しかったですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The red light was dazzling and flashing, wasn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「長時間に及ぶ激闘はなんと十分も続き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The fierce battle lasted surprisingly for a full ten minutes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんと、なんとなんと最後は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and, and, and in the end..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ザンスさんがギブアップを宣言して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mr. Zans declared his surrender,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決着となりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and that settled the match."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これもまた意外やった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That was also surprising."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合後のインタビューによりますと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "According to the post-match interview,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っている最中にアレキサンダーを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he said that during the fight, he really wanted to make Alexander his subordinate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしても部下にしたくなった、と」
「その為には圧勝なんて言葉でも足りない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For that reason, a mere overwhelming victory wouldn't be enough,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真の圧勝をしなければならない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had to achieve a true crushing victory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このままやっても勝っただろうが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He might have won even if he continued as is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それじゃあ辛勝になって意味がない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but that would have been a narrow win and meaningless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから試合を預けたかったのだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So he wanted to entrust the match..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、仰っていました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's what he said."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「分かるような分からんような……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I kind of understand it, but also kind of don't...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、変なこだわりの多い子やからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, he's a kid with a lot of strange fixations, after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみにこの後、ザンス選手は――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, after this, player Zans—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当は勝てないと思ったんじゃないですか〜？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did you really think you couldn't win, huh~?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、失礼なこと聞いた記者を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He punched and swung around the reporter who rudely asked that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殴って振り回してブン投げてました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then threw him far away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにしとんねん、あの子は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What on earth is that kid doing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Dブロック代表者決定戦、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "D Block Representative Decider Match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条早雲ＶＳ裸族王バファムーン」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hojo Soun VS The Naked Tribe King Bafamoon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPANの天才陰陽師と全裸男の戦いやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a battle between Japan's genius onmyoji and a naked man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ってなんや、言葉にするとすごいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Well, when you put it into words it sounds amazing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時間をかけるのは得策ではないと判断したか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Perhaps deciding it’s unwise to take too much time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲選手が試合開始から大量の式神を飛ばし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Soun unleashed a large number of shikigami from the start,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バファムーン選手の行動を封じます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: trying to restrict Bafamoon’s actions."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、それで倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, that wasn’t enough to knock down

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バファムーン選手はんではなかったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Bafamoon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなのです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陰陽術の猛攻を受けながら尚、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even while taking a fierce onslaught of onmyoji magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲選手への歩みを止めませんでした！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he did not stop moving toward player Soun!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一歩一歩、のっしのっしと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Step by step, lumbering along,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全裸の男が早雲はんに迫っていく姿は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the naked man steadily approached Soun,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんともホラー的な絵面やったで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which was quite a horror-like sight..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「接近を許してしまえば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If he is allowed to get close,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけで早雲選手の敗北は確実です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soun’s defeat would be certain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これにより試合は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because of this, the match became a battle of whether

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バファムーン選手が攻撃圏内に入るのが先か、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bafamoon enters the attack range first,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲選手が仕留めきるのが先かという戦いに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or Soun can finish him off before that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「式神を飛ばし続ける早雲選手と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Player Soun kept releasing shikigami,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一歩ずつ歩き続けるバファムーン選手！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while player Bafamoon continued to walk forward step by step!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ジリジリとした試合に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In this tense match,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みーんな言葉を失って夢中で見とったわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: everyone was speechless and totally absorbed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして！　長い時間をかけて！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And then! After a long time!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は至近距離まで近づき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the two got close to point-blank range,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バファムーン選手が腕を振りかぶります！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and player Bafamoon raised his arm to strike!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「決まるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Will it hit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、皆が固唾を呑んだその瞬間！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that breath-held moment for everyone!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、惜しい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, so close!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここで限界に達したバファムーン選手！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, player Bafamoon reached his limit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バッタリと倒れてしまいました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He collapsed suddenly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ホンマ、あともう一歩やったんやけどなー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Really, it was just one step away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、手に汗握ったで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it had us all gripping sweat in our hands."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合後インタビューによると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "According to the post-match interview,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々の目的は優勝ではなく全裸教の布教。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the original goal wasn’t victory but spreading the Naked Sect religion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに関しては成功を収めたと言っていい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In that regard, he can be said to have succeeded."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、なんとも満足げでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seemed quite satisfied."
